topics.body:
So here's a random thing that frustrates me: The lack of badassness in the LGBT movement. Pretty much everything produced for people who fall somewhere under that umbrella is almost always a drama or romantic comedy or occasionally horror. Its even worse when you get into things for straight audiences, where at best you're the character who gets all the best lines.

We need badass queer characters. I want a fucking hard R gay action movie. I want gay John Mclain diving through windows while dual weilding submachines. I want lesbian Blade slicing motherfuckers in half with a katana. We've got enough of this sad shit, I say its high time for some ridiculous badass shit.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7
